title: Need help with map control
body: I was able to click the map, and the camera would take me there. Now when I click on the mini map it doesn't do anything. Please help me this has caused me pain, I need to be able to click on the minimap and my camera will take me (let me see) where I click.

replies.body:
Oh, I run into this one all the time due to my key mappings.  On my mac, option-M toggles between being able and unable to click-scroll on the minimap.  It's probably alt-M on windows.

BTW Targon/Riot, if you can make this key mapping changeable that would be most excellent.
Does this happen in all Window modes or only specific ones? You can change your window mode under your **VIDEO** settings in-game.
